name: The Apocawiz
description:
My first "full-length" entry for Ludum Dare in years. There are almost definitely bugs which I apologize for.

A boss rush to the end of the world. Face 4 bosses as you try to add time back to the world. Run out of time and the world ends - and you with it.

Save the world and it's still full of idiots who will just die someday anyway. >_<

Made for Ludum Dare 50! - "Delay the inevitable."
